member.name: T:FarmersMarket.Helpers.CachedFeed
member.summary: Implements a syndication feed whose contents are cached on a rolling expiration period (default is 5 minutes)

member.name: M:FarmersMarket.Helpers.Extensions.ToRelativeDate(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Converts the specified DateTime to its relative date.
member.returns: A string value based on the relative date of the datetime as compared to the current date.
